meanings.definition: A state of mental confusion or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The deliriousness of the child after eating too much candy was evident in his wild behavior.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with deliriousness due to the high fever.
meanings.sent3: The deliriousness of the puppy chasing its tail was both amusing and adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her deliriousness was like a whirlwind of thoughts, swirling and mixing in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The deliriousness of the carnival with its bright lights and loud music was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being delirious.
meanings.sent1: The deliriousness of his speech made it hard to understand what he was trying to say.
meanings.sent2: She experienced deliriousness during the fever, causing her to hallucinate.
meanings.sent3: The deliriousness of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: In the deliriousness of the moment, time seemed to slow down to a crawl.
meanings.sent5: The deliriousness of the party atmosphere was contagious, spreading joy to all attendees.
